meanings.definition: A formal or ceremonial act or procedure
meanings.sent1: The graduation rites were held in the school auditorium.
meanings.sent2: The funeral rites were conducted with reverence and respect.
meanings.sent3: During the wedding rites, the ring bearer tripped and almost lost the rings!
meanings.sent4: The annual award ceremony was a rite of passage for the students.
meanings.sent5: The coronation rites of the king were filled with grandeur and tradition.

meanings.definition: A religious or solemn ceremony or ritual
meanings.sent1: The priest performed the sacred rites with devotion.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization had elaborate burial rites.
meanings.sent3: The holiday rites involved singing and dancing around the fire.
meanings.sent4: The initiation rites symbolized the beginning of a new spiritual journey.
meanings.sent5: The traditional rites of the tribe were passed down through generations.
